page.title: 18THE SELBY CANAL
page.content: The Canal is 4_5 mile long.It is 6 feet in the deepest place and 1 foot _18 inch in the shallowest place.It is 62 foot in the widest place. There are 5_6{bridges}on the canal and 2{locks. The locks open about twice a day. There is only 1{swing bridge}that now opens on the canal and it opens about 5 times a week.There are quite a lot of wild flowers by the canal here are some of them,{Poppies, Buttercups, {Daisies, Primroses, Traveller's Joy, {Chickweed,Wild Strawberry, Cow Parsley {Ox Eye Daisy}and{Dog Rose}are just some. There are different kinds of traffic that uses the canal - there are house boats ,barges and cargoes. The canal is polluted by chemical factories because of the waste they pump in. There is a lot of wildlife. There are lots of ducks. When you go for a walk it is very quiet.
